alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 4:36PM EDT until June 03 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... South central Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 436 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Loysville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carlisle, Plainfield, Schlusser, Boiling Springs, Mount Holly Springs, Newville, Bloserville, Loysville, Carlisle Springs, Colonel Denning State Park, Walnut Bottom and Landisburg. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 212 to 228. Interstate 81 from mile markers 34 to 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
